display_long_description:
**Two Player Co-Op**

Two agents enter. Two agents must leave. These missions demand teamwork in the face of overwhelming odds. When threats spiral in from every direction, having a partner isn't just an advantage – it's essential. 
[media]

**Time Bends. They Break.**

You're a glass cannon, lethal but fragile. One hit ends you, but they have to land it first. Snatch guns from the air, deflect bullets and stretch time into eternity so you can plot the perfect strike.
[media]

**Cognitive Disobedience**

It’s 2135 and Nuragen’s ChronOS has transformed the world, enabling humans to digitize memories and live forever. What began as a company has become an empire that holds humanity's throat in an iron grip. 

As a Chronostrike Agent, you must defend this priceless data using your ultimate weapon: the power to manipulate time. Along the way, you’ll uncover dark truths buried deep in the labyrinth of human consciousness.
[media]

**Learn or Get Burned**

Each reboot is a lesson. Watch as muscle memory takes over, transforming impossible odds into an elegant dance. Don't follow your enemies – lead them straight into your crosshairs.
[media]

**Master the Mayhem**

You’re always outnumbered, but time is on your side. Stand still, and the world stops, move, and the clock resumes. Your body is the controller. Think fast, move faster, and let intuition guide you. Your directive is clear, the human mind isn’t.
[media]
